# Calculus Study Program - Workspace Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a Python-based educational program to help students practice basic calculus concepts including derivatives, integrals, and function analysis.

## Project Status
- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements - Python calculus study program
- [x] Scaffold the Project - Created main.py, requirements.txt, README.md
- [ ] Customize the Project - Ready for user's specific requirements
- [x] Install Required Extensions - None required
- [x] Compile the Project - Python environment configured (Python 3.12.0)
- [ ] Create and Run Task - Can be added when needed
- [ ] Launch the Project - Ready to run with `python main.py`
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete - README.md and copilot-instructions.md created

## Development Guidelines
- Keep code educational and easy to understand for learning purposes
- Include clear comments and explanations for calculus concepts
- Focus on interactive, user-friendly experience
- Use Python best practices suitable for educational software
